title: Presence Detection Vision
description: Recognize if there are people in an image
long_description: This project allows you to train a YOLO-based model to identify human presence in an image/video. This model is suitable for safety and compliance monitoring in industrial areas, energy-saving presence detection for home/office automation, etc.
